title: "WWU public lecture series turns eye on AI, its use and its ethics"
excerpt: "To combat fears of artificial intelligence, the Western Washington University Academy for Lifelong Learning is putting on a series of lectures about AI in art, technology, health care and government. Monthly lectures at the Bellingham Cruise Terminal will address the use of AI, as well as public concerns."
